name: Where the Sun Always Shines
description:
"I have faith in you. After all, you are my Angel of Music."

Synopsis
Blake Radcliffe, aged 32, was once an aspiring author...
But now, after the tragic loss of his wife, Cynthia, his aspirations have vanished.
With no inspiration, and no hope for the future, Blake becomes a recluse - until a chance meeting with a young girl called Sunny,
who just so happens to be in the wrong place at the right time.

Can Sunny help shine a little light in Blake's dreary life, or will her best efforts be for nothing?

Credits
Writing/Coding: ebi-hime
Sprites: mokibun
Extra art: Kuroneko
Backgrounds: Esclachier
Music: Mock Off


Notes
This VN is around 20k.
Features comic book style text presentation.
There are no romance elements.
And I have nothing personal against Gerard Butler!
